chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: How hast thou helped him that is without power? how savest thou the arm that hath no strength?
items.plainText: How hast thou helped him that is without power? how savest thou the arm that hath no strength?

items.text: How hast thou counselled him that hath no wisdom? and how hast thou plentifully declared the thing as it is?
items.plainText: How hast thou counselled him that hath no wisdom? and how hast thou plentifully declared the thing as it is?

items.text: To whom hast thou uttered words? and whose spirit came from thee?
items.plainText: To whom hast thou uttered words? and whose spirit came from thee?

items.text: Dead things are formed from under the waters, and the inhabitants thereof.
items.plainText: Dead things are formed from under the waters, and the inhabitants thereof.

items.text: Hell is naked before him, and destruction hath no covering.
items.plainText: Hell is naked before him, and destruction hath no covering.

items.text: He stretcheth out the north over the empty place, and hangeth the earth upon nothing.
items.plainText: He stretcheth out the north over the empty place, and hangeth the earth upon nothing.

items.text: He bindeth up the waters in his thick clouds; and the cloud is not rent under them.
items.plainText: He bindeth up the waters in his thick clouds; and the cloud is not rent under them.

items.text: He holdeth back the face of his throne, and spreadeth his cloud upon it.
items.plainText: He holdeth back the face of his throne, and spreadeth his cloud upon it.

items.text: He hath compassed the waters with bounds, until the day and night come to an end.
items.plainText: He hath compassed the waters with bounds, until the day and night come to an end.

items.text: The pillars of heaven tremble and are astonished at his reproof.
items.plainText: The pillars of heaven tremble and are astonished at his reproof.

items.text: He divideth the sea with his power, and by his understanding he smiteth through the proud.
items.plainText: He divideth the sea with his power, and by his understanding he smiteth through the proud.

items.text: By his spirit he hath garnished the heavens; his hand hath formed the crooked serpent.
items.plainText: By his spirit he hath garnished the heavens; his hand hath formed the crooked serpent.

items.text: Lo, these are parts of his ways: but how little a portion is heard of him? but the thunder of his power who can understand?
items.plainText: Lo, these are parts of his ways: but how little a portion is heard of him? but the thunder of his power who can understand?
